author: Phil Vickery
method: Heat a heavy bottomed saucepan, a third full of vegetable oil, until a breadcrumb sizzles in it. (CAUTION: hot oil can be dangerous! Do not leave unattended.) Add the potato slices and cook for 1-2 minutes, until golden. Remove and drain on kitchen towels. Serve in a large bowl.
ingredients: 300ml/Â½ pint vegetable oil, for deep-frying,  4 Shetland black potatoes, thinly sliced
